provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Water Resources (Prescribed ciclri-.
Fees) Regulations, 2009.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The fees payable to the Authority in relation to an application
for or the grant of a licence or consent shall be as specified in the
Schedule.                                                             ~sho6ul0

                                                                            Fees
Application for a licence to abstract and use water or con
  struct or alter or cause to be constructed or alter any works
  for the abstraction and use of water             ...      ...

   cause to be ccnstructcd or altered any warks for the abstract-
   tion and use of water (renewable every five (5) years) ...
Application for the consent of the Authority to sink, enlarge
  or otherwise alter a well         ...        ...        ...
Consent (permit) to sink. enlarge or otherwise alter a well
  (valid for one (1) year)         ...        ...       ...
Application for a welldrillers licence            ...         ...
Welldriller's licence (renewable every two (2) yean)
